```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(gganimate)
library(magick)
```

```{r}
x<-seq(-1,1,0.1)
fx<-1/x
datos<-data.frame(x,fx)
grafica<-ggplot(datos)+geom_point(aes(x=x,y=fx))
grafica
```

```{r}
grafica+transition_reveal(x)
```
